title: (x) Something Old, Something New serif face - Tribute {Florian}
content:
Does anyone know what?

comments.content:
Hi Arun,  
looks like [Tribute](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011123200/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/tribute/) by Frank Heine/Emigre … that ‘g’! That ‘N’!  
;°)  
F

Just checked emigre, it indeed is Tribute.

Thanks very much Florian!
